name: Remember? (Mike Klubnika)
description:
Escape from an entity and defend yourself using your surroundings.  Try to reme̸m̶b̷e̵r̸.

This game was made in under 48 hours for the MITS iX Game Jam,  and is heavily inspired by the short film "ROT" by Corridor Digital.

---

CONTROLS

Mouse wheel : Adjust sensitivity

WASD : Move

Left click : Pick up / throw objects
